name: Shiva Aarti
title: Om Jai Shiv Omkara
description: A powerful aarti dedicated to Lord Shiva, the supreme deity of destruction and transformation. This aarti is performed during Maha Shivaratri and other auspicious occasions to seek his blessings.
significance: Invokes Lord Shiva's blessings for spiritual growth, liberation from negative influences, and inner peace.

seo.description: Complete Shiva Aarti with lyrics in Hindi and English, meaning, and significance. Learn the proper way to perform Lord Shiva aarti.

sections.title: Lord Shiva Aarti
sections.content: The Shiva Aarti is a powerful devotional hymn that praises Lord Shiva, the supreme ascetic who represents destruction, transformation, and ultimate liberation.

sections.title: Historical Significance
sections.content: This aarti has been sung for centuries in Shaivite tradition. It is especially significant during Maha Shivaratri when Lord Shiva is worshipped throughout the night.

sections.title: Complete Aarti Lyrics
sections.content: The complete lyrics of Shiva Aarti in Hindi with English translation.

subsections.title: Hindi Lyrics
subsections.english:
Om Jai Shiv Omkara, Lord Om Jai Shiv Omkara
Brahma Vishnu Sadashiv, with Ardhangini (half-body as Parvati)
Om Jai Shiv Omkara

One face, four faces, five faces reign
Swan-seated, Garuda-seated, bull-mounted arranged
Om Jai Shiv Omkara

Two arms, four arms, ten arms look beautiful
Seeing the three forms, people of three worlds are enchanted
Om Jai Shiv Omkara

Rosary, forest garland, rudraksha beads garland
Sandal and musk adorn, broad moon on forehead
Om Jai Shiv Omkara
subsections.meaning: This aarti praises Lord Shiva in his various forms, acknowledging his infinite manifestations and divine attributes.

sections.title: How to Perform the Aarti
sections.content: Proper method and rituals for performing Shiva Aarti.

subsections.title: Preparation
subsections.content: Clean the worship area, arrange a thali with diya, bilva leaves, dhatura, bhang, and water. Place Shivaling or Shiva idol facing north.

subsections.title: Aarti Procedure
subsections.content: Offer water and bilva leaves to the Shivaling, light the diya, and perform the aarti while chanting 'Om Namah Shivaya' with devotion.

sections.title: Spiritual Significance
sections.content: Understanding the deeper meaning and benefits of performing Shiva Aarti.

subsections.title: Spiritual Liberation
subsections.content: The aarti helps in attaining spiritual liberation (moksha) by purifying the soul and removing karmic obstacles.

subsections.title: Inner Peace
subsections.content: Regular performance of this aarti brings inner peace, mental clarity, and freedom from worldly attachments.
